mapper.sql: c_ADID, c_AmbulanceNumber, c_DeviceNumber, c_UpdateTime, c_UpdateUserID, c_OrgID, c_DeviceType
mapper.select: select count(1) from cp_Ambulance_Device A LEFT JOIN cp_FirstAid F ON A.c_OrgID = F.c_OrgID and A.c_DeviceNumber=F.c_DeviceNumber where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into cp_Ambulance_Device (c_ADID, c_AmbulanceNumber, c_DeviceNumber, c_UpdateTime, c_UpdateUserID, c_OrgID, c_DeviceType) values (#{cAdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cAmbulancenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cDevicenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cUpdateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cOrgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cDevicetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

where c_ADID = #{cAdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
